name: Ego and the Id
description:
Can you unite the divisions within yourself to overcome the physical manifestations of your horrors?

Strengthen your resolve and control your split personalities in this "UNSTABLE" combat arena! Control your Ego, a shield-wielding behemoth capable of blocking any attack while simultaneously controlling your Id, a ruthless but eloquent sword-wielder capable of deflecting any attack.

This game uses a Mouse to interact with menus but ABSOLUTELY REQUIRES the use of a (PS4 or Xbox) gamepad/controller.

== Controls ==

Ego (blue character)

Move - Left Stick

Dash - Left Stick Press

Guard - Left Bumper

Attack - Left Trigger

Id (Purple)

Move - Right Stick

Dash - Right Stick Press

Parry - Right Bumper

Attack - Right Trigger
